com.bandyer.android_sdk.call.receiver

Class CallStatusEventObserver

  • com.bandyer.android_sdk.call.receiver.CallStatusEventObserver
  • Deprecated.

    public class CallStatusEventObserver

    This receiver can be used to observe whether a call is started or ended. Typically can be used to show custom ui in other activities than call activity when the call is running in background.

    • Method Detail

      • observeCallStatus

        public void observeCallStatus(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity appCompatActivity,
                              CallStatusListener callStatusObserver)
        Deprecated. 

        Observe the starting or ending event of a call from an activity. The observer is automatically disposed when activity is destroyed.

        Parameters:
        appCompatActivity - AppCompatActivity
        callStatusObserver - CallStatusListener
